item.description:
Showtime is 7:10 in the IMAX Theater Downstairs.  I will be at the theater by 6:10 and we will head in for seats by 6:40.   (Very good idea to get tickets ahead of time, since it is opening weekend.)

Getting seats 30 minutes ahead of the start time will allow us to take turns getting snacks and visiting the restroom prior to the previews.  Because it is in the lower theater, things can be a bit confusing as there is no good gathering place.  I will be outside the ropes near the concession stand until/unless they let us line up inside the inner lobby.   

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after.  We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after and bring cash.

 

Movie Details:

Release Date:September 9, 2011 (conventional theaters and IMAX)
Studio: Warner Bros. Pictures
Director:Steven Soderbergh
Screenwriter: Scott Z. Burns
Starring:Marion Cotillard, Matt Damon, Laurence Fishburne, Jude Law, Gwyneth Paltrow, Kate Winslet, Bryan Cranston, Sanaa Lathan, Jennifer Ehle
Genre: Thriller
MPAA Rating: PG-13 (for disturbing content and some language)
Official Website: Contagionmovie.com 

Plot Summary: "Contagion" follows the rapid progress of a lethal airborne virus that kills within days. As the fast-moving epidemic grows, the worldwide medical community races to find a cure and control the panic that spreads faster than the virus itself. At the same time, ordinary people struggle to survive in a society coming apart.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
